privacyPolicy.title: Our Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: At Triple AI, safeguarding the data of our customers and users is essential to our mission. Our platform maintains high standards of data security and privacy, ensuring the confidentiality and integrity of the information provided. Compliance with LGPD (General Data Protection Law) and other applicable laws has always been a priority for our company since its inception, with our products and services guided by the principle of "privacy by design."

firstClause.title: Collection of Personal Data
data: Information Provided by Customers: We collect personal information voluntarily provided when using our services and interacting with the platform. This data may include name, email address, job title, company, phone number, and other relevant details.
Usage and Interaction Data: When you use our platform, we collect usage data, such as access information, activities performed, search queries, and other interactions with our services.

Cookies and Similar Technologies: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience, personalize content, and collect statistical information, such as device type, browser, and IP address.

secondClause.title: Triple AI's Commitment
data: Non-Use of Data for Training: Information shared with OpenAI via API, especially personal information, is not used to train their models, ensuring the privacy of our customers' data. This is explicitly described in the "API Data Privacy" terms, which are available on the OpenAI website. (https://openai.com/api-data-privacy).

Transparency: We commit to being transparent about our data processing practices and the Triple AI privacy policy. We are dedicated to providing clear and detailed information on how we use and protect personal information, which can always be obtained promptly through direct contact with our Data Protection Officer (DPO).
Data Security: We have implemented technical and organizational security measures to protect customer data against unauthorized access, misuse, and unauthorized disclosure.

thirdClause.title: Use and Purpose of Data
data: Personalization and Service Enhancement: The collected information is used to personalize the user experience on the platform and improve our services by offering relevant content and features.
Communication and Support: We use personal data to respond to requests, provide technical support, and share important information about our services.
Improvements and Analytics: We conduct statistical analysis to enhance our features, identify trends, and optimize platform usability.

fourthClause.title: Data Sharing
data: Third-Party Service Providers: Under certain circumstances, we may share personal information with service providers who assist us in operating the platform and providing services, such as OpenAI and Pinecone. We are well acquainted with the privacy policies of each of these service providers, which are technically and ethically aligned to ensure the protection and privacy of shared data by Triple AI.
Customer Consent: We will not share personal information with third parties without the prior consent of customers unless required to fulfill legal obligations or permitted by law.

fifthClause.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
fifthClause.data: We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy as needed. Changes will be communicated to customers through our platform or other appropriate means.

sixthClause.title: Contact and Data Protection Officer (DPO)
sixthClause.data: If you have any questions, requests, or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us through the channels provided on the platform. Our Data Protection Officer (DPO) can be contacted via email at fundadores@tripleai.com.br. Thank you for trusting Triple AI. We are committed to protecting the privacy and data security of our customers and users.
